title: 158 Did R. Kelly deserve 30 years?
itunes:title: 158 Did R. Kelly deserve 30 years?
description:
We discuss the 30 year sentence passed down to R&B singer R. Kelly. We both agree that he 100% should be locked up but we have to ask if race played a role in his sentencing. It gets touchy! We also debate if the parents should have been held responsible as well. Let us know your thoughts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
